description: Try our easy to follow Oat Biscuit Sandwiches With Chocolate Ganache recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Oat Biscuit Sandwiches With Chocolate Ganache
name: Oat Biscuit Sandwiches With Chocolate Ganache Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add milk chocolate and dark chocolate, stirring until melted. Return to heat, if needed. Cool and allow to thicken. Sandwich 2 biscuits with 1 tsp chocolate filling. Chill to firm.
